user_input: Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. Add a Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany (DE01). Create all of the template properties. Use a max capacity of 1000 MW.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications for the TJ Sectoral Model. Use PLEXOS CRUD pipelines for categories, objects, memberships, properties, and attributes.

tasks.description: Create a new Nuclear SMR Generator object located in Germany (DE01) within the TJ Sectoral Model. Use the appropriate electricity generation class/category and a compliant object name.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the appropriate category and class for a Nuclear SMR Generator in region DE01 (Germany), and generate a compliant object name.

tasks.description: Create the standard template properties for the newly added Nuclear SMR Generator and set Max Capacity to 1000 MW.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the newly created Nuclear SMR Generator object in DE01 and apply the Nuclear SMR generator template properties. Explicitly set the Max Capacity (MW) property to 1000.
